heading: WHO WE ARE
title: Out with the old and in with the new.
description: is the latest pioneering utility token built to disrupt the exploitative PPV indsutry, and replace it with an affordable and secure network using authentic technology.

main.main: The PPV industry exploits $2.3 billion USD from millions of fans of sport worldwide. The recent emergence of influencer exhibition matches is a new form of sports entertainment enjoyed by so many people. Already, we have identified a push to bring dishonest PPV practices into the world of influencer matches. This is a frightening future that we refuse to allow happen.

With the assistance of you and our community, we will dismantle unfair monopolies in entertainment and decentralise the entire industry. We will also trigger a once-in-a-lifetime transfer of wealth and open up influencer exhibition matches so that they can be afforded and watched by all.
